Description.Text:
Venit Barra Hotel is conveniently located in the Jacarepagua region within walking distance of Barra Olympic Park. Barra da Tijuca is 12 Kms away, while the Galeao Internacional Airport is 23 Kms away.
Each room offers air conditioning, cable Tv, mini-bar, free bathroom amenities and speakers with Bluetooth connectivity. Services available include a Fitness Centre, a Spa with Sauna, a Restaurant and a Bar. Guests can enjoy the outdoor swimming pool and wi-fi access is available on the property.
